com.imkrisna.samsung.nservice

Class NSDiscovery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.imkrisna.samsung.nservice.NSDiscovery

  • public class NSDiscovery
extends Object

    This class is helper to find N-Service capable devices (NSDevice) using SSDP Packet listener from com.cyabergarage.upnp.ssdp. This class will broadcast UPnP SSDP "M-SEARCH" packet throughout the networks and waiting the reply of "NOTIFY" packet from N-Service capable devices.

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    I Made Krisna Widhiastra (im.krisna@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    NSDevice}, NSConnection}, NSDiscoveryListener}

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  NSDiscovery.NSDiscoveryListener
      This class implementing SearchResponseListener is a response handler for incoming SSDPPacket and parsing the information to decide whether the devices is N-Service capable device or not then storing the capable devices to NSConnection instance.

    • Field Detail

      • DEBUG_TAG

        private static final String DEBUG_TAG
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UPNP_NSCREEN_FILTER

        public static final String UPNP_NSCREEN_FILTER

        public static final String UPNP_NSCREEN_FILTER

        UPnP SSDP "ST" header value when doing "M-SEARCH" broadcast and filtering "NT" value when receiving "NOTIFY" packets from UPnP Devices

        Static Value: urn:samsung.com:service:MultiScreenService:1

        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • NSDiscovery

        public NSDiscovery(NSConnection connection)

        public NSDiscovery(NSConnection connection)

        Constructor for NSDiscovery class for searching N-Service capable devices in the networks

        Parameters:
        connection - - NSConnection instance where the found NSDevice will be stored
        Since:
        1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • search

        public void search()

        public void search()

        Starting the N-Service capable devices discovery sequence, Sending "M-SEARCH" packet and waiting for the matched "NOTIFY" packet. The response from N-Service capable device will be handled by NSDiscovery.NSDiscoveryListener class.

        Since:
        1.0.0

      • dispose

        public void dispose()

        public void dispose()

        Cleanup resources, connections, listeners to prevent Address/Port blocking when allocating search request again.

        Since:
        1.0.0
